name: DebateMaster
author: Jeremy B. Merrill

sections.description: Enables a shortcode, [debate], that allows multiple blog contributors to add their contributions to a discussion in an individualized way by displaying a custom background color, name, and a gravatar. I appreciate your feedback!
sections.installation:
Unzip debatemaster.zip into /wp-content/plugins/debatemaster/ .

Check out the DebateMaster options tab and set the colors for each contributor. That’s about it.
sections.faq:
Why are you so awesome, Jeremy B. Merrill?

I’m hot cuz I’m fly. You ain’t cuz you not. This is why, this is why I’m hot.

short_description: Enables a shortcode, [debate], that allows multiple blog contributors to add their contributions to a discussion.
